mechanics.condition: Creature is attempting to move through the 10-foot square area of Grease
mechanics.outcome: The 10-foot square area is Difficult Terrain

mechanics.condition: Creature is standing in the 10-foot square area when Grease appears
mechanics.outcome: Creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or fall Prone

mechanics.trigger: Creature enters area OR ends turn in area
mechanics.condition: Creature enters the 10-foot square area of Grease for the first time on a turn OR Creature ends its turn in the area
mechanics.outcome: Creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or fall Prone

description_text: Slick grease covers the ground in a 10-foot square centered on a point within range and turns it into difficult terrain for the duration. When the grease appears, each creature standing in its area must succeed on a dexterity saving throw or fall prone. A creature that enters the area or ends its turn there must also succeed on a dexterity saving throw or fall prone.
